I got it so I can do my homework and watch movies on it. I have flashplayer on it and adobe. This is the worse experience I have had from Amazon and I wish I would of known. These people do not even understand what I am talking about. I don't know where thy are from, I asked them what size is the barrel on the charger and all that and they never answered me.Update: 4/27/2013:Still not being able to be used! I asked to return it after they said if I paid about $20 to send it back they would refund my money, they never contacted me back.I am asking anyone out there if you could leave a comment and tell me what charger works for this tablet. I have a PIPO S1 Smart PC tablet. If I could get it to charge I would play it and change my review but still the customer service sucks!

Reviews.Title: Its awesome
Reviews.Author: Jason R. Jack "Jack"
Reviews.Content: I originally loved this thing but after a few weeks of use I have discovered its a pain. it cam from china the manual is in chinese. I had to restore to factory settings about 2 days ago and it restored it to chinese! it took me 4 hours to figure out how to get it back into english. On top of all this updateing the firmware is not possible by normal means because it is rooted! it also does not charge via micro usb like most anroid devices it has a 5volt dc charger, I am currently unable to find one anywhere in town for less than 30$. all in all Im very dispointed with it.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money on Ainol
Reviews.Author: Walid Hamdan
Reviews.Content: I buoght the Aurora 2 for my son the screen has bunch of dead pixels and the battery show 100% all the time till it dies. Ainol.com web screens their reviews and will not shows reviews that does not meet their satisfaction. Advise Spend a little more $ and get a tablet that has warranty offices in the USA. Last week I contacted the seller have not got any respond. Ainol is junky quality. Go get Archos, nexus 7 or Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Stunning Value But Not A Perfect Tablet
Reviews.Author: Manuel Pedraza
Reviews.Content: When I was looking for the best Ultra Cheap tablet on the market this really was the very best, for 99 bucks is such an amazing tablet compared to the competition at the same price range that honestly is pretty terrible.The seller was little bit delayed with the order but it arrived perfectly. But when I unboxed I noticed a big problem, there was no charger included, so the real cost of the tablet adds the price of the 2.1 amp charger you need to buy, also no manual in the box.Talking of the tablet itself its build quality is what you get for the price, a glossy black plastic back that seems pretty scratchable, also the display, but both of them included some adhesive protectors that I dont want to damage. The display has a poor 800 by 480 resolution but honestly it doesnt look that bad in person, however its outdoor visibility is fairly poor.Hardware however is excellent for the money and the device feels REALLY fast, not as a quad core but much better that the single core equipped competition. And the addition of Jelly Bean and Project Butter is really nice.However is not a perfect device, theres a strange problem that makes the device reboot itself without explanation, sometimes the screen does not respond to touch and you need to reboot it. But again thats not a dealbreaker at those things dont happen every time.The USB OTG feature works really well but the HDMI output does not and seems to output the same resolution of the tablet, so it doesnt upscale to HD. Thats pretty sad knowing that the tablet has a pretty cool app that lets you do the same thing as Pop Up Play on the Galaxy S3.Tablet market is changing and high quality products are getting cheaper, while I can still recommend the PIPO S1 you must know that in the near future tablets that are equal or even better than the PIPO will be avaliable, so its your choice.

Reviews.Title: review of product
Reviews.Author: Daniel J. McCollum
Reviews.Content: No problem with the operation of the unit, battery life stinks, constantly have to charge it. We have other 7" droids in house and batteries last longer.

Reviews.Title: wanting a refund, hopefully I can get it.
Reviews.Author: Connie Gist
Reviews.Content: The product came without a charger or earphones. The product is not working properly; it is flashing on and off and is not user  friendly. Some of the pages were only in Chinese and could not make it go to English. Have asked for a refund and hopefully will be able to have that happen. Bought a keyboard and case for it and the keyboard keys are sticking and is also not a good product.

Reviews.Title: Nice while it lasted!
Reviews.Author: Joe E. Gonzales
Reviews.Content: Well Amazon service is great and package a(PIMO Smart S1 tablet)arrived on time! One thing that annoyed me right off the bat was that there was no US wall charger just a USB power cord. So I plug into my other USB phone changer and tablet charges up. I log on to internet via WiFi no problem and signed on to Google play to download my favorite apps and games. Download Fruit ninja and start playing. BAM!!! the system crashes and goes into a system reboot cycles that the tablet wouldn't come out of! So I think OK I need to reset the tablet? Well I press the reset and it is a NO GO! Tablet will not get past start-up screen. Went to Amazon printed out a label and sent back via UPS. I checked with a Mobile Phone tech and he told me it probably was problem with game stressing CPU cooling with cheap tablets and they are not able to dissipate the heat like a better made tables, but he did not say this definitive. In the end he told me "what do you expect with a hundred dollar tablet". It probably would not have died if I had not played any games on the tablet but fruit ninja is not that powerful a game come on! Oh well!I would not recommend this tablet!

Reviews.Title: cheap products, don't expect too much
Reviews.Author: sokae
Reviews.Content: When I bought this tablet, I didn't think its was going to last long, I only bought it to use for acpuple months or so than I will replace it which I actually did but in a way that I had no choices since it died on me. Last me about 2 months than it started acting up weird on me like rebooting, unrespio and pow! Doesn't take chare no more and now its seeping in its grave........

Reviews.Title: I just ordered  a second one!
Reviews.Author: Patrick Howdeshell
Reviews.Content: Daughter has had one over year and it works like a champ! I just ordered  a second one! It is as nice as any high price I have used!

Reviews.Title: Pipe tablet
Reviews.Author: alva cortes
Reviews.Content: Pipe tablet I need an English ManuelI purchase two of these and I wished the Manuel were in English is it possible to send one in English so I can know what to do with also I was downloading app and it froze on me I don't know what to do now ...please I need help ...

Reviews.Title: not what i expected
Reviews.Author: roxy
Reviews.Content: I expected it to be better than advertised. I don't like how the camera is facing the front and i didn't know it was shipping all the way from China so it took weeks 2 arrived. Could use the money on something other tablet.

Reviews.Title: junk
Reviews.Author: westes
Reviews.Content: the very first time I turned it on it took a while to turn on however I did like that it was just like my android phone but mabey just a little too much like it because it had ringtones? ? you can not make calls so I wasn't sure what that was about,  I was able to use my tablet only twice before it completely froze & stopped working I would give it zero stars but that is not an option, but I must say the company was very understanding & agreed to give me a refund.

Reviews.Title: Can't believe how bad this is
Reviews.Author: raquelle thenard "shopaholic"
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these and both units have issues with the battery.  If the charge is low they have problems charging - the charge gets very intermittent until it hits about 20% and then it charges as normal.  One of the devices ran out of battery completely with kids playing games and 2 days later I still cannot get it to charge!  I've now processed both of these units for refunds - I'm so disappointed.

Reviews.Title: aweful
Reviews.Author: Diana
Reviews.Content: Sorry I purchased his.  Did not know it would be from China. You live and learn. Wont buy from this place again. The quality is horrible!

Reviews.Title: Won't connect to Wifi
Reviews.Author: Disappointed
Reviews.Content: For the first few months of having this tablet, it worked fine, but i got back from a vacation in which i used it a lot in the car, and it wouldn't connect to my homes Wifi.I tried resetting it, and it did nothing.I would not recommend this to anybody under any circumstances.I guess i deserve it for buying a $100 dollar tablet.

Reviews.Title: Product Works Fine
Reviews.Author: noneofyourbusiness
Reviews.Content: Product works fine... havent fully tested it but its pretty much bare bone...not much loaded on it but overall a good product. works quick but i only give three stars for the fact i think it should have came preloaded with games and apps that would prove its full capabilities..... sound quality poor but works

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Tablet!
Reviews.Author: L. Flake
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful tablet! The games work smoothly. Netflix DOES WORK! The tablet came rooted. The only reason I did not give it 5 stars is because CinemaNow had a problem with it being rooted, I haven't figured out how to play Amazon instant movies on it ye, and the sound quality could be better. Other than that, I love it!!! This tablet was purchased for my boyfriend's 10 year old son to play on, and I cannot wait to see what he thinks of it.

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: Emilio Caraballo
Reviews.Content: Excelent services, very fast and good. I try to buy nextly.Thanks forma your help...see youEmilio caraballo. Bye

Reviews.Title: Dish out more money for a better product
Reviews.Author: N.E.K
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet in late 4/2013 as a bday gift for my 8yr old son. He loves it, however, the picture quality sucks, & the volume is pretty low, I highly recommed headphones. And there's a whole world to it that you can't access coz it's in Chinese (or some other Asian language)The tablet won't charge, it started with us having to adjust the charger, rotating it severally, but finally stopped working 2 months after we bought it.I read the reviews and thought, it's just for my son, but I should have just paid extra and gotten him a better known brand. You do get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: terrible!
Reviews.Author: kaceyb
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my son. I figured I would get him an inexpensive one to start with just to see how careful he would be. Bad idea! The tablet froze constantly, turned on and off by itself, would say it was 100% charged then all of the sudden 5 minutes later it was dead, it wouldnt play netflix, the camera sucks and is only on the front screen, there are no cases for it available anywhere so I was unable to protect it from breaking...pretty much a piece of junk! Now my son is upset that his brand new tablet that he was super excited to get is a waste of time. I'm in the process of returning it. I have since purchased him a samsung galaxy tab 2 7 inch tablet. it was 80.00 more but I figured after dealing with this crap I would get something backed by a good brand name. It works great! I recomend the samsung to anyone for their kids mainly because you can get an otterbox for it so it is better protected. this pipo brand is total bulls*** and a waste of money and the return process is frustrating. DO NOT BUY!!!!!

Reviews.Title: i hate it and my son hates it
Reviews.Author: steph
Reviews.Content: bought one for me and for my son...battery life lasts less than 30 minutes and it is a hassel to charge it after the battery goes dead.  wouldnt reccomend im trying to return the two i bought now.  everything thats inexpensive is not  good

Reviews.Title: The tablets that were not!
Reviews.Author: Frank M Delsied
Reviews.Content: Had an order of three tablets from AccDepot said they shipped ,Waited more ?The notice said they were in town for delivery?I send message were is my package? waited waitedThey were sent back because of complaints about software defects.They were going to sell me some diffrent tablets with bad reviews and over night shipping free of costExtra SD cards free for my troubles.I went with a diffrent product and seller not that AccDepot is Bad they really tried to make good..Dont sell a product, if you dont try and test them your self and have guarantees !I have order lots from amazon and never had problems until this order.I stopped the order and am getting a refund

Reviews.Title: Poor Quality Control.
Reviews.Author: gbair
Reviews.Content: I really don't like having my time wasted. I read the reviews and thought this tablet would serve my needs. To turn on a tablet and see it work was great. Then I saw the battery was at 48%. I found the charger cable and plugged it in. Nothing happened. I tried different USB ports and nothing. Now I'm returning it for a refund. Yeah Amazon for great return policy. That's why I try to stay with Prime purchases as much as possible.

Reviews.Title: Directly Out of Box, Fully Charged, Piece of Crap
Reviews.Author: Kris Garvey
Reviews.Content: I spent days browsing reviews and stats for various tablets both here and on Walmart.com, and decided on this one because it was compared to the Nexus 7 and also had great video reviews on YouTube. I was NOT aware before ordering that it was being shipped from China, but I was cautiously optimistic it would still be a good tablet. I did get the package relatively quickly considering it came from China, but did have some hang-ups with the FedEx guy too.I opened the tablet, was pretty excited about how sleek and shiny and pretty it looked. I tried to remove the protective clearcoat sticky cover from the back, and it was peeling off the serial number, so I had to use a small craft X-acto knife to cut around the sticker and peel off the rest of the covering.I noticed upon power-up that it was at about 63% so I left it in my computer usb charge-up for several hours. At bedtime, it said fully charged 100%, so I put it directly into sleep mode and left it for morning. When I came back to try it out not even 10 hrs later, the battery had already gone down to about 82%. I also was having a very hard time trying to get it to change from Chinese to English language, even when I correctly selected the English and the location being NY. I noticed as I was trying to figure these menu options out, that the battery was literally draining at 1% PER MINUTE. At that point I figured there is NO WAY I am keeping this shiny paperweight that was over $100!I have requested a full refund and am hoping that it is honored! I suggest sticking with a known name brand, most of these cheaper, unknown brands are all from Chinese sellers and shippers.

Reviews.Title: Does'nt support Netflix, according the the seller, AccDepot
Reviews.Author: Greg
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately this table doesn't support very many streaming formats... at least not Netflix.In fact, I have several of the cheep Tablets and this seems to be a deficiency in them all.To get around this you could buy "PlayOn"..., but then you will also need a  PC nearbyin order to stream Netflix over WiFi to the tablet...and then I've had issues with PlayOn.If you by this table with the intent of streaming movies, I would think twice.Ask the seller if their tablet supports a particular stream format before you buy.____________________________Email Reply________________________Dear Greg,Thanks so much for your inquiry. I am sorry that our tablet can't support Netflix.For any other questions, pls feel free to let us know.Best regards,AccDepot Customer Service TeamPlease don't worry, we are sure to reply your email within 12 hours.

Reviews.Title: "Great Tablet"
Reviews.Author: marvin johnson
Reviews.Content: I received the tablet in good condition and it worked great out the box.the tablet is super fast can handle any application. This is what I wanted!

Reviews.Title: I love the tablet the best
Reviews.Author: godfrey haughton
Reviews.Content: but I crack the touchscreen how can I replace the touchscreen. the tablet is so good because it's still working perfectly

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: WILLIAM
Reviews.Content: It's very faster . The WIFI conection is easy and faster ,  I can download everything in play store .

Reviews.Title: sucks really bad
Reviews.Author: Miguel Mendoza
Reviews.Content: I don't know what i was thinking when i bought this tablet sure its specks are equal to an ipad but laggy, battery sucks flash player is not even legit like a pirated version or something i have fixed many ipods iphones pcs one ipad and love ios i am never switching to android again
